SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.CommunicationProtocol.ServerClient

Interface ServerClientMessageExecutor

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientController
public interface ServerClientMessageExecutor extends Serializable
This interface defines the methods that a server can call to communicate with a client. It includes methods for acknowledging connections, handling login and sign-up processes, updating lobby information, managing game states, and handling in-game updates.
